verses.verse: Paul<WG3972>, a servant<WG1401> of God<WG2316>, and<WG1161> an apostle<WG652> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547>, according to<WG2596> the faith<WG4102> of God's<WG2316> elect<WG1588>, and<WG2532> the acknowledging<WG1922> of the truth<WG225> which<WG3588> is after<WG2596> godliness<WG2150>;
In<WG1909> hope<WG1680> of eternal<WG166> life<WG2222>, which<WG3739> God<WG2316>, that cannot lie<WG893>, promised<WG1861> before<WG4253> the world<WG166> began<WG5550>;

But<WG1161> hath<WG5319> in due<WG2398> times<WG2540> manifested<WG5319> his<WG846> word<WG3056> through<WG1722> preaching<WG2782>, which<WG3739> is committed<WG4100> unto me<WG1473> according to<WG2596> the commandment<WG2003> of God<WG2316> our<WG2257> Saviour<WG4990>;

To Titus<WG5103>, mine own<WG1103> son<WG5043> after<WG2596> the common<WG2839> faith<WG4102>: Grace<WG5485>, mercy<WG1656>, and peace<WG1515>, from<WG575> God<WG2316> the Father<WG3962> and<WG2532> the Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> our<WG2257> Saviour<WG4990>.

For this<WG5127> cause<WG5484> left I<WG2641> thee<WG4571> in<WG1722> Crete<WG2914>, that<WG2443> thou shouldest set in order<WG1930> the things that are wanting<WG3007>, and<WG2532> ordain<WG2525> elders<WG4245> in every<WG2596> city<WG4172>, as<WG5613> I<WG1473> had appointed<WG1299> thee<WG4671>:

If any<WG1536> be<WG2076> blameless<WG410>, the husband<WG435> of one<WG3391> wife<WG1135>, having<WG2192> faithful<WG4103> children<WG5043> not<WG3361> accused<WG1722><WG2724> of riot<WG810> or<WG2228> unruly<WG506>.

For<WG1063> a bishop<WG1985> must<WG1163> be<WG1511> blameless<WG410>, as<WG5613> the steward<WG3623> of God<WG2316>; not<WG3361> selfwilled<WG829>, not<WG3361> soon angry<WG3711>, not<WG3361> given to wine<WG3943>, no<WG3361> striker<WG4131>, not<WG3361> given to filthy lucre<WG146>;
But<WG235> a lover of hospitality<WG5382>, a lover of good men<WG5358>, sober<WG4998>, just<WG1342>, holy<WG3741>, temperate<WG1468>;

Holding fast<WG472> the faithful<WG4103> word<WG3056> as<WG2596> he hath been taught<WG1322>, that<WG2443> he may be<WG5600> able<WG1415> by<WG1722> sound<WG5198> doctrine<WG1319> both<WG2532> to exhort<WG3870> and<WG2532> to convince<WG1651> the gainsayers<WG483>.
For<WG1063> there are<WG1526> many<WG4183> unruly<WG506> and<WG2532> vain talkers<WG3151> and<WG2532> deceivers<WG5423>, specially<WG3122> they of<WG1537> the circumcision<WG4061>:

Whose<WG3739> mouths<WG1993> must<WG1163> be stopped<WG1993>, who<WG3748> subvert<WG396> whole<WG3650> houses<WG3624>, teaching<WG1321> things which<WG3739> they ought<WG1163> not<WG3361>, for<WG5484> filthy<WG150> lucre's<WG2771> sake<WG5484>.

One<WG5100> of<WG1537> themselves<WG846>, even a prophet<WG4396> of their<WG846> own<WG2398>, said<WG2036>, The Cretians<WG2912> are alway<WG104> liars<WG5583>, evil<WG2556> beasts<WG2342>, slow<WG692> bellies<WG1064>.
This<WG3778> witness<WG3141> is<WG2076> true<WG227>. Wherefore<WG1223><WG3739><WG156> rebuke<WG1651> them<WG846> sharply<WG664>, that<WG2443> they may be sound<WG5198> in<WG1722> the faith<WG4102>;
Not<WG3361> giving heed<WG4337> to Jewish<WG2451> fables<WG3454>, and<WG2532> commandments<WG1785> of men<WG444>, that turn from<WG654> the truth<WG225>.

Unto the pure<WG2513> all things<WG3956> are pure<WG3303><WG2513>: but<WG1161> unto them that are defiled<WG3392> and<WG2532> unbelieving<WG571> is nothing<WG3762> pure<WG2513>; but<WG235> even<WG2532> their<WG846> mind<WG3563> and<WG2532> conscience<WG4893> is defiled<WG3392>.

They profess<WG3670> that they know<WG1492> God<WG2316>; but<WG1161> in works<WG2041> they deny<WG720> him, being<WG5607> abominable<WG947>, and<WG2532> disobedient<WG545>, and<WG2532> unto<WG4314> every<WG3956> good<WG18> work<WG2041> reprobate<WG96>.
